class TrackGraphDataGenerator[source]

TrackGraphDataGenerator(pion_file_list:list, n_clusters:int, batch_size:int, shuffle:bool=True, num_procs=32, preprocess=False, output_dir=None)

DataGenerator class for extracting and formating data from list of root files This data generator uses the cell_geo file to create the input graph structure

{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
event_ind = np.random.randint(num_events)
print(event_ind, event_data['nCluster'][event_ind], event_data['dR'][event_ind]<1.2)

n_clusters = -1
nodes = []
if n_clusters==-1:
    c_inds = range(event_data['nCluster'][event_ind])
else:
    c_inds = np.argsort(event_data['cluster_E'][event_ind])[::-1]
    c_inds = c_inds[:n_clusters]
    
for c in c_inds:
    if event_data['dR'][event_ind][c]>1.2:
        continue
    cluster_E = np.log10(event_data['cluster_E'][event_ind][c])
    curr_node = [cluster_E, 0, 0]
    nodes.append(curr_node)

trackPt = np.log10(event_data['trackPt'][event_ind][0])
nodes.append([0, trackPt, event_data['trackEta'][event_ind][0]])
print(f'All nodes: {nodes}')

n_clusters = 1
nodes = []
if n_clusters==-1:
    c_inds = range(event_data['nCluster'][event_ind])
else:
    c_inds = np.argsort(event_data['cluster_E'][event_ind])[::-1]
    c_inds = c_inds[:n_clusters]
    
for c in c_inds:
    if event_data['dR'][event_ind][c]>1.2:
        continue
    cluster_E = np.log10(event_data['cluster_E'][event_ind][c])
    curr_node = [cluster_E, 0, 0]
    nodes.append(curr_node)

trackPt = np.log10(event_data['trackPt'][event_ind][0])
nodes.append([0, trackPt, event_data['trackEta'][event_ind][0]])
print(f'Leading node: {nodes}')

All nodes: [[2.0181618, 0, 0], [1.6945977, 0, 0], [0, 1.6944367, -2.2061374]]
Leading node: [[2.0181618, 0, 0], [0, 1.6944367, -2.2061374]]
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
graph = GraphsTuple(nodes=tf.convert_to_tensor(nodes),
                    globals=None, 
                    edges=None,
                    senders=None,
                    receivers=None,
                    n_node=tf.convert_to_tensor([len(nodes)]),
                    n_edge=tf.convert_to_tensor([0]))
